root.name: Casino
root.description: Casino is a gambling simulator released in 1978 for the Atari 2600. The game was programmed by Bob Whitehead, programmer of Chopper Command, Skiing, and Boxing. The game included simulations of two different types of blackjack, stud poker, and poker solitaire, and was controlled by using the Atari Paddles. Casino was released as part of Microsoft's Game Room in June 2010.
